item.description:
My friend Rev. Mary Francis who is also a priest at the Boston Center of Light is teaching this workshop on "The Art of Meditation." If you have any desire to grow spiritually and in consciousness, I recommend meditating. And this is truly an Art! This workshop will help you.

Here is more about the workshop:
When we get still in our mind, we can draw close to the great source of peace and love. This
seminar emphasizes the importance of learning to listen, without distraction, to that “still small
voice” within through the practice of meditation. How does one come to this place in meditation of
spiritual silence and stillness when our minds are filled with chaos and chatter? In this seminar, learn
to quiet your mind and tap into a natural state of rest, peace, joy, and creativity
that is possible for everyone.
